subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Behind Joe Johnson’s 23 points, 19 of which came in the second half, the Nets held off a late rally by the Raptors and ended a season-high five-game losing streak.
snippet: Behind Joe Johnson’s 23 points, 19 of which came in the second half, the Nets held off a late rally by the Raptors and ended a season-high five-game losing streak.
